translations: vi.同情；理解；赞同，支持（sympathize 的过去式和过去分词）

sentences.sentence: Most of the people living there sympathized with the guerrillas.
sentences.translation: 住在那儿的大部分人支持这些游击队员。

sentences.sentence: He has never really sympathized with the aims of Animal Rights activists.
sentences.translation: 他从来没有真正赞同过动物权利保护者的目标。

sentences.sentence: Many romantic young couples have sympathized with his choice.
sentences.translation: 许多崇尚浪漫的年轻情侣们纷纷表示支持他的选择。
